Companion Notes:
Huge Evolution: Size is Huge: gains +16 Str, +8 Con, +3 AC, +2 CMB/CMD, and 10' reach; suffers -4 Dex, -2 Attack, -4 Fly, -8 Stealth
Large Evolution: Size is Large: gains +8 Str, +4 Con, +1 AC, +1 CMB/CMD, and 10' reach; suffers -2 Dex, -1 Attack, -2 Fly, -4 Stealth

Climb Evolution: 20' Climb

Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half

Magic Attacks Evolution: Natural attacks count as magic and aligned
Multiattack: Reduce additional attack penalty to -2 or second attack at -5
Pincers Evolution: Pincer attacks inflict 2d6+12 HP each
Reach Evolution: +5' reach w/chosen natural attack
Share Spells (Summoner): May cast spells that effect self on eidolon instead
Slam Evolution: Slam attacks inflict 2d8+18 HP each
Swim Evolution: 20' Swim
Tail Evolution: +4 Acrobatics (balance)
